page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE.
page.content: I get up at 6.15am.to do my{paper {round.}My Dad has been unemployed now for two years, so I am the only wage earner in the family.{School}starts at 8.55am.and lasts until 3.15pm.Some of the teachers are alright but hometime can't come quick enough.After I've delivered the 'Evening Chronicle'and had some tea I'm off{down to the woods with my friends.We have a secret den down there but it won't be secret any more now that I've told you! Sometimes we go{chasing rabbits}with lurchers, these are fast hunting dogs.I would like one but my dad says it costs enough to feed us without feeding a dog.The best place for rabbits is in the woods around the airport.It's all private land of course and the farmers are not very happy when they see us, but they have to catch us first! { Mark,aged 12.
